everyone when great -> warriors : 1
when great warriors -> their : 1
great warriors their -> reward : 1
warriors their reward -> is : 1

is eternal life -> in : 1

just like any -> the : 1
like any the -> valhalla : 1

the valhalla group -> has : 1
the valhalla group -> like : 1
valhalla group has -> to : 1
group has to -> adapt : 1
has to adapt -> to : 1
to adapt to -> nothing : 1

of carol cocktail -> currently : 1

and not at -> all : 1

rolled through the -> rows : 1

the rows of -> seats : 1
rows of seats -> and : 1

and out across -> stage : 1

for a very -> said : 1
for a very -> long : 2
a very said -> genghis : 1
very said genghis -> khan : 1
said genghis khan -> there : 1

there week passed -> far : 1
week passed far -> the : 1
passed far the -> minor : 1
far the minor -> war : 1
the minor war -> sputtered : 1
minor war sputtered -> ambitiously : 1

sputtered ambitiously as -> it : 1
ambitiously as it -> swept : 1
as it swept -> through : 1
it swept through -> a : 1

through a town -> feared : 1

feared the newspaper -> men : 1

on their and -> drops : 1
their and drops -> of : 1
and drops of -> blood : 1
